item.title: Openvpn Routed LANS
item.description: Open Routed Multiple LANS Lans behind OpenVPN here is an example of how to have multiple lans behind OpenVPN from #OpenVPN on freenode. Our user had a openvpn server with a lan (10.10.2.0/24) behind it, and 2 client with lans behind them: client1 with lan 10.10.1.0/24 client2 with lan 10.10.3.0/24 He wanted machines on all 3 lans to be able to communicate using a tun (routed) setup. Every machine with a LAN behind it must have IP forwarding enabled.
